column4: Trying to install Nvidia Drivers - You appear to be running an X server; please exit X before installing.    -- What does that mean?
means that you are trying to manually install the drivers. Not needed anymore
you should use the drivers from the repos instead, unless you experience problems

wierd, the default 'nv' driver detected my monitors resolution fine but meh, guess you cant always be that lucky =). In any case, if you just installed, you should get a popup or an icon near the clock, about using restricted drivers
